General.Name: FD Technologies PLC
General.Description: FD Technologies plc provides software and consulting services in the United Kingdom and internationally. The company operates through three segments: KX, First Derivative, and MRP. It provides KX, a real-time decision-making engine that captures data, from various location and format; First Derivative, a capital markets consulting solutions; and MRP Prelytix platform, an enterprise-class predictive account-based marketing solution. The company also licenses software. It serves finance, technology, retail, pharma, manufacturing, and energy markets. The company was formerly known as First Derivatives plc and changed its name to FD Technologies plc in July 2021. FD Technologies plc was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Newry, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Brian Conlon House, Newry, United Kingdom, BT35 6BP
